page.title: 12Cynheidre pit,5 Rds
page.content:
{1 Type of coal} The large coal is approx.300x300mm and is concessionary coal.Past and present employees receive a quantity of free coal. {Differant Coals and their {Destinations.} French - Households Beans - School boilers Grains - Domestic central heating Duff - Industry
The coal is transported to:- South Wales coal merchants Irish Market Surplus to England Merchants Duff to Aberthaw power station {The main geological problems are:-} Outbursts. The Gwendraeth Valley Fault. Surface Seismology.
